segments.text: The scene is a peculiar mix of domestic calm and impending disaster.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I look out the window above the sink.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Through the panes, I see a tidy garden with a path and bushes.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The outside world appears so serene and well-kept.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It creates such a stark contrast with the chaos unfolding inside.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Inside, water is flooding the floor, and a child is on a shaky stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman continues her task, completely oblivious to it all.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's frankly quite disgusting to see the water spreading everywhere.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: That water is surely damaging the cabinets and floorboards.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The peaceful garden seems to mock the interior's turmoil.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wish the woman would just turn around and see the mess.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The difference between order and disarray is palpable here.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's unsettling how calm the exterior remains while the inside is so messy.
segments.speaker: PAR
